ygData.subject: Melatite
ygData.msgSnippet: Well finally thru many hours of  *ack* camping, i have gotten both sides to the greaves. Now off to get some Melatite... Hmm..Mining Co in Sol A huh? Man they
ygData.messageBody:
Well finally thru many hours of *ack* camping, i have
gotten both sides to the greaves. Now off to get some
Melatite...
Hmm..Mining Co in Sol A huh? Man they hate me.
get a friend who is ok faction wise there..
Hmm..no merchant that he can find. But he doesnt know
where the castle is.
Ask around.
Rumor has it that the MC clockworks carry it. ok...
but you killed many of them and not a single drop huh?
Killed a whole mess of other clockworks and nothing
either? DOH!!

Now this was from someone we asked. We had had a rough
day so we didnt spend any quality time in SolA killing
anything.
As a matter of fact, a friend dropped into the lava
and was lucky to get his corpse back. That put a
damper on everything so we called it a night.

So what is this long drawn out post for?
Well to find out where to get the Melatite of
course...

Anyone happen to know?

Bathory D'Allatu

=====
